document_data.Description:
[[File:UddronBlass.png|thumb|right|270px|''Uddron towers over the Heroes of Baldur's Gate.'']]
This curious illthid wore some sort of mask and hood. Uddron appeared to be far more muscular than a typical mind flayer, and revealed a well-built torso under a spiked mantle. Uddron's pupil-less eyes had a soft white-pink glow.
document_data.Possessions: Uddron wielded a gold-silver two-pronged [[dagger]].{{Cite comic/Mindbreaker 5}}
document_data.Activities: Uddron sent lackeys to do their work whilst the mind flayer made preparations on behalf of the cult of the Absolute. However, Blass would step in should his underlings not be able to handle certain circumstances.
document_data.Relationships: The Master seemed to keep a pet [[displacer beast]], who closely followed their orders.{{Cite comic/Mindbreaker 3}}

History.The Mindbreaker: Krydle's and Uddron's minds were interlocked due to a mindflayer tadpole inside the former, and the remaining heroes made their way to a secret chamber under the streets. Here, Uddron believed he could bring Baldur's Gate to its knees by summoning the Mindbreaker. As the adventurers rushed in, Krydle stabbed Blass with a [[poison]]ed dagger, slaying the illithid. As this happened, Delina closed the portal on the Mindbreaker, causing it to be destroyed.
